title: Movie Trailers 10-06-10: Megamind, Rec 2, Gulliver's Travels
description:
PlayStation-Ready Movie Trailers
June 10, 2010


This is a collection of movie trailers for next week premieres
and latest interesting trailers in 480p. I've noticed recently
that the more I watch trailers, the less I go to movie theaters.


=== Latest trailers:

Alpha and Omega 3D - Trailer: 480p stereo 2:26
Gulliver's Travels - Trailer: 480p 5.1ch 2:25
Mao's Last Dancer - Trailer: 480p 5.1ch 2:24
Megamind - Trailer 2: 480p stereo 2:29
Rango - Teaser: 480p stereo 0:53
Rec 2 - Trailer: 480p stereo 2:05
Sorcerer's Apprentice, The - Trailer 3: 480p stereo 2:28
Standing Ovation - Trailer: 480p stereo 1:39
Takers - Trailer 2: 480p stereo 2:16

=== And the Mortal Kombat bonus:

Mortal Kombat Promo: 480p stereo 7:49
